posts.post_content:
Up for your consideration is this Fred Clarke T205. I don't see a crease. Good centering/color. Nice back. I guess just the edge/corner wear accounts for the grade. Can't figure out how to price it so just shoot me a fair offer and we'll go from there. Thanks, Pat

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/nollpm/pre-war[/url]
